description: This Kotlin source file defines an Android Fragment named InstruccionesFragment, which manages a UI screen with anchor buttons for navigation and a button to open a web demo. It handles focus navigation via DPAD keys and manages the fragment lifecycle.

classes.name: InstruccionesFragment
classes.description: An Android Fragment providing instructions screen with anchor buttons and focus navigation.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes buttons, sets click and key listeners for navigation and actions.

methods.name: openWebDemo
methods.description: Replaces current fragment with WebDemoFragment to show a web demo.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates a new instance of InstruccionesFragment.
